description:
Mifuyu is a second-year student. She is Yuuki`s classmate and is a member of Shokken. She is actually one year older than Yuuki since she had to repeat the same class due to an illness before she saw Yuuki for the first time. She is from Hokkaido. Yuuki, Chisato and Mifuyu go to school together on foot every morning.
Source: Wiki
name: Kiba Mifuyu
